title: G is auto-pressed at the beginning of a game
body:
Because G is auto pressed, you can't use P to open shop since like usual you can't press 2 buttons together.
Also for the same reason, you can't exit the game and you can't even left click.
I know G is auto pressed because when I right click, I can directly ping.
It was auto fixed after I died once...

SAD!!!!

replies.body: Sounds more like a system/keyboard bug than league, honestly. Did you prod G? No macros or anything?

Hmm, maybe I should add some more information. 
I was playing aatrox that game and I was like 1/6............
That game ended before 20 minutes.
